results.title: Oral Metformin for Treating Dermatological Diseases: A Systematic Review.
results.text_hl: Results: Sixty-four studies met inclusion criteria. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ demonstrates promising clinical response and favorable safety profile for treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Spherocytosis_Type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C567159 @@@HS@@@, with most @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ experiencing a decrease in frequency or severity of @<m>DISEASE_Spherocytosis_Type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C567159 @@@HS@@@ flares, and some experiencing full resolution of @<m>DISEASE_Spherocytosis_Type_1</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C567159 @@@HS@@@ lesions.
